overview:
I am an Entrepreneur, Founder, Consultant, Mentor, Writer, Inventor and Philanthropist.

As an Entrepreneur I bootstrapped 4 companies. I attend SCORE and learn from retired entrepreneurs. I also became an active member of the NJTC. My entrepreneurial experience started at age 13, working “Under-The-Table” at Yellow Cab of Trenton, NJ. I was hired for $1.00 a day, to perform maintenance checks of oil and tire pressure on cabs. I noticed the same man parked his cab in front of the cab garage door every night; even though their was nothing wrong with the cab. In the morning, I had to move the cab, to move other cabs into the garage for service. I figured out the man was making me warm up his cab in the morning, so he could be the first cab out of the lot and get the first fare. I made a sign and began to sell warm-ups as a cash service for $1.00. Soon I had 30+ cabs a day to start and warm-up every morning before school.

As a Consultant at RS Consulting, my blend of advertising agency, start- up and entrepreneurial experience make me a complete B2B and B2C business solution to scale your businesses marketing and sales objectives. I add value through due diligence. I meet with start-up and existing businesses, to assist in business development and projects. I also meet with advertisers, manufacturers, distributors, venture capitalists, angel investors and C level leaders to understand their corporate aims. With a humble approach, I acquire professional knowledge and expertise in each field of need. I demonstrate comprehensive team building, collaborate and manage utilizing a “Transformational Leadership Style”. I am conservative, I exercise realism and good common sense. I focus on making well thought out effective decisions to move projects forward.

I give back to society by mentoring and inspiring other entrepreneurs to gain their sea legs.

My passion is the art of the deal for Branding, Marketing and Advertising at Globe Icons Interactive.
